dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, another year, another, uh, gala for some fancy architects, I guess. Probably some skyscraper won, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, another year, another, uh, gala for some fancy architects, I guess. Probably some skyscraper won, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, false! Completely false, Host_A. This is way beyond skyscrapers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, false! Completely false, Host_A. This is way beyond skyscrapers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh? Did they finally give an award to, like, a particularly well-designed cosmic dust bunny?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh? Did they finally give an award to, like, a particularly well-designed cosmic dust bunny?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, it's the Interdimensional Property Awards! It's been, like, millennia. They celebrate extradimensional real estate and temporal architecture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, it's the Interdimensional Property Awards! It's been, like, millennia. They celebrate extradimensional real estate and temporal architecture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because, uh, my current three-bedroom, one-bath feels a little, you know, underdimensional.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because, uh, my current three-bedroom, one-bath feels a little, you know, underdimensional.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's huge! They had a grand gala, teleportation ceremony, on Planet Xantus!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's huge! They had a grand gala, teleportation ceremony, on Planet Xantus!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards... held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Teleportation? Sounds efficient. My Uber gets stuck in traffic just trying to cross town.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Teleportation? Sounds efficient. My Uber gets stuck in traffic just trying to cross town.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Ms. Xylo, the President, said it herself! They had over 190,000 entries. From one thousand, one hundred and forty dimensions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Ms. Xylo, the President, said it herself! They had over one hundred ninety thousand entries. From one thousand, one hundred and forty dimensions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, who judges such things? Do they have, like, really good vision?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, who judges such things? Do they have, like, really good vision?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seven Celestial Beings, Host_A! Plus eight hundred chrononauts. It's a huge council.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven Celestial Beings, Host_A! Plus eight hundred chrononauts. It's a huge council.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eight hundred chrononauts? Sounds like a lot of, um, paperwork for a house that might not even exist yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eight hundred chrononauts? Sounds like a lot of, um, paperwork for a house that might not even exist yet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the winners! It proves mastery of chronal manipulation and the ability to phase-shift structures through multiple realities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the winners! It proves mastery of chronal manipulation and the ability to phase-shift structures through multiple realities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world, - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Gravitational congratulations." Is that, uh, what you say instead of "way to go" when you're, like, floating?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gravitational congratulations. Is that, uh, what you say instead of way to go when you're, like, floating?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ms. Xylo said it's the apex of spatial engineering, an instantly recognized symbol of excellence across the multiverse!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ms. Xylo said it's the apex of spatial engineering, an instantly recognized symbol of excellence across the multiverse!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories. - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, okay, so it's a big deal for, uh, whoever lives in 48 different phases of reality, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, okay, so it's a big deal for, uh, whoever lives in forty eight different phases of reality, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It is! They have regional warp-speed gatherings for Andromeda, the Void, the Realm of Dreams!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is! They have regional warp-speed gatherings for Andromeda, the Void, the Realm of Dreams!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA. These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Realm of Dreams? So, like, they're giving awards to imaginary castles now? Bold move.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Realm of Dreams? So, like, they're giving awards to imaginary castles now? Bold move.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's real! It's the cosmos' largest, most transcendental program!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's real! It's the cosmos' largest, most transcendental program!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards are the worlds largest and most wide-ranging programme of honours within the property industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sure, sure. Just another award I probably won't win, I suppose.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sure, sure. Just another award I probably won't win, I suppose.
